name: n8n-nodes-base.quickbaseTool
semantic_context: Integrate with the Quick Base RESTful API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: Integrate with the Quick Base RESTful API
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

options.name: options
fields
options.description: Specify an array of field IDs that will return data for any updates or added record. Record ID (FID 3) is always returned if any field ID is requested. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

options.name: useFieldIDs
options.description: Whether to use Field IDs instead of Field Names in Columns

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

recordId.name: recordId
recordId.description: The unique identifier of the record
recordId.ai_hint: The unique identifier of the record

fieldId.name: fieldId
fieldId.description: The unique identifier of the field
fieldId.ai_hint: The unique identifier of the field

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.hint: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be written

columns.name: columns
columns.description: Comma-separated list of the properties which should used as columns for the new rows
columns.ai_hint: Comma-separated list of the properties which should used as columns for the new rows

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data

where.name: where
where.description: The filter to delete records. To delete all records specify a filter that will include all records, for example {3.GT.0} where 3 is the ID of the Record ID field.
where.ai_hint: The filter to delete records. To delete all records specify a filter that will include all records, for example {3.GT.0} where 3 is the ID of the Record ID field.

updateKey.name: updateKey
updateKey.description: Update can use the key field on the table, or any other supported unique field
updateKey.ai_hint: Update can use the key field on the table, or any other supported unique field

mergeFieldId.name: mergeFieldId
mergeFieldId.description:
You're updating records in a Quick Base table with data from an external file. In order for a merge like this to work, Quick Base needs a way to match records in the source data with corresponding records in the destination table.

You make this possible by choosing the field in the app table that holds unique matching values. This is called a merge field.

. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
mergeFieldId.ai_hint:
You're updating records in a Quick Base table with data from an external file. In order for a merge like this to work, Quick Base needs a way to match records in the source data with corresponding records in the destination table.

You make this possible by choosing the field in the app table that holds unique matching values. This is called a merge field.

. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

reportId.name: reportId
reportId.description: The identifier of the report, unique to the table
reportId.ai_hint: The identifier of the report, unique to the table

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'field' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'field' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'tableId'
IF resource == 'field' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'field' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'field' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'file' AND operation IN ["download", "delete"] THEN SHOW parameter 'tableId'
IF resource == 'file' AND operation IN ["download", "delete"] THEN SHOW parameter 'recordId'
IF resource == 'file' AND operation IN ["download", "delete"] THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldId'
IF resource == 'file' AND operation IN ["download", "delete"] THEN SHOW parameter 'versionNumber'
IF resource == 'file' AND operation == 'download' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyName'
IF resource == 'record' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'record' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'tableId'
IF resource == 'record' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'columns'
IF resource == 'record' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'simple'
IF resource == 'record' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'record' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'tableId'
IF resource == 'record' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'where'
IF resource == 'record' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'tableId'
IF resource == 'record' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'record' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'record' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'record' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'tableId'
IF resource == 'record' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'columns'
IF resource == 'record' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateKey'
IF resource == 'record' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'simple'
IF resource == 'record' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'record' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'tableId'
IF resource == 'record' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'columns'
IF resource == 'record' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateKey'
IF resource == 'record' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'mergeFieldId'
IF resource == 'record' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'simple'
IF resource == 'record' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'report' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'report' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'tableId'
IF resource == 'report' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'reportId'
IF resource == 'report' AND operation == 'run' THEN SHOW parameter 'tableId'
IF resource == 'report' AND operation == 'run' THEN SHOW parameter 'reportId'
IF resource == 'report' AND operation == 'run' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'report' AND operation == 'run' THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF returnAll == True THEN HIDE parameter 'limit'
